page.title: 03OCCUPATIONS IN STRACHAN
page.content:
Of the sample of 40 households {56 vehicles,}cars or jeeps are{owned. There is no regular transport;people must travel to work by car. { 23 people work at home, { 16 travel more than 5 miles}to work, { 2 people}travel{around 10 miles,}and { 15}travel{more than 20 miles}to work.
Although a small rural community, there is a wide variety of occupations with 18 people{working on the land,}17 in{professional work,}10 in work re- lating to the{oil industry,}6 employed by the{Regional Council}and 4 employed in the{creative arts.}22 people are {self-employed}and only 22 woman work {other than as house-wives.
